title: stuck :(
body: its stuck here and it went through once and got stuck in another spot. i uninstalled and it wont even download it gets stuck at this same spot again.

replies.body:
Hey, sorry for the delay in responding here.  The client can look like this if it's having trouble connecting to our services.  I'm convinced there may be a network issue struggling to reach us, if you're also having issues after reinstalling.  I recommend going through each step of our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to clear up whatever is blocking this to get your client up to date.

You should also be able to use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to auto-configure your firewall settings in case that may be playing a part.

im gonna get really upset. ive been stuck on this crap for ever and nobody wants to respond to me and tell me what tf to do. nobody else online has the same issue so i cant look up how to fix it either.
